Fantastic Forces was my first set. Any pieces I can get to play out of that set are most welcome!

December 13, 2021
MaxOfSteel616
Disappointing. I can see the use of the 10 range prob and free forceblast (which can be done from a range now), but over pointed for what she does. For a brotherhood team, I would rather use Destiny (the legacy card is cheaper and easier to defend, and the main set can retool twice a turn, and is also easier to defend). For an avengers team I would rather use the Daredevil from this set who is cheaper, easier to defend, and has triple target incap. Unless I was specifically trying to play a Scarlet Witch and didn’t have point for the main set one, I can’t see myself playing her.
December 12, 2021
UncorkedMonk
I actually love this for 35 points you get a 10 range prob, stealth to stay safe, and phasing to reposition. Equip her with something like the reality gem for a 10 range perplex and some tk.
December 8, 2021
Goop
The new 25pt Daredevil in this set beats this hands down. She's way too easy to kill.
